nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures Annual 2019 is a one-shot issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. It is comprised of the stories "Hare-Brained Heist," by Cavan Scott, and "So Much More," by Pierrick Colinet and Elsa Charretier. The issue was published on August 14, 2019 by IDW Publishing.

A daring rescue mission leads Lando—and his new friend Jaxxon—to the seat of Imperial power, where they must recover an important artifact that will inspire a planet to drive the Empire from their home.
